tool_description: Converts DNA data between different file formats commonly used in genetic genealogy and research.

input_format.description: Input format: vcf, plink, 23andme, ancestry, gedcom

output_format.description: Output format: vcf, plink, 23andme, ancestry, gedcom

error_messages: Unsupported format combination: Cannot convert between the specified input and output formats.
Invalid input format: Use one of [vcf, plink, 23andme, ancestry, gedcom].
Invalid output format: Use one of [vcf, plink, 23andme, ancestry, gedcom].
Compression error: Use one of [none, gzip, zip].
Format conversion failed: Data incompatibility between input and output formats.
usage: Specify input_format and output_format for conversion. Set include_header and compression as needed for your target application.

conversion_status.description: Success or failure status of conversion

output_file_size.description: Size of converted file in bytes
